metadata.title: CVE-2024-5321 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A security issue was discovered in Kubernetes clusters with Windows nodeswhere BUILTIN\Users may be able to read container logs and NTAUTHORITY\Authenticated Users may be able to modify container logs.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
